# Copilot Instructions

Follow the instructions and constraints defined in `.ai/specs/base-standards.mdc`.

## Load Order

1. `.ai/README.md`
2. `.ai/specs/base-standards.mdc`
3. Relevant role in `.ai/agents/`
4. Relevant workflow in `.ai/commands/` or `.ai/prompts/`
5. `docs/sdd/quality/guardrails.md`

## Source of Truth

Behavior comes from approved specs in `docs/sdd/specs/`.

## Adapter Reference

See `.ai/adapters/copilot/instructions.md` for detailed Copilot-specific guidance.
